original_text: And he saw that rest was good, and the land that it was pleasant; and bowed his shoulder to bear, and became a servant unto tribute.
korean_text: 그는 쉴 곳을 보고 좋게 여기며 토지를 보고 아름답게 여기고 어깨를 내려 짐을 메고 압제 아래에서 섬기리로다

sentences.original_text: And he saw that rest was good
and the land that it was pleasant
and bowed his shoulder to bear
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 짐을 지기 위해 어깨를 숙였고

sentences.original_text: and became a servant unto tribute
